sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Home = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}

Your Health Is Our Priority

Providing exceptional healthcare services with compassion and cutting-edge technology for over 25 years.

{!user ? ( <> Book an Appointment ) : ( Go to Dashboard )}
{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

Comprehensive healthcare services for all your needs

Cardiology

Advanced cardiac care with state-of-the-art diagnostic equipment.

Orthopedics

Specialized care for bones, joints, and musculoskeletal system.

Neurology

Comprehensive neurological care for brain disorders.

View All Services
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Access

Book Appointment

Find a Doctor

Patient Portal

{!user && Login Required}
{/* Footer */}

MediCare Hospital

123 Health Avenue
Medical City, MC 12345

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Services
  • Doctors

Contact

Phone: (123) 456-7890
Email: info@medicare.com

Connect With Us

© 2023 MediCare Hospital. All Rights Reserved.

); }; export default Home;
